sentence:
Mr. FROST. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to honor this year's Orlando  Sentinel's Central Floridians of the Year, JJ Holmes and his mother,  Alison Holmes. Together, they are a force, not just in central Florida  but across the entire State and country.

JJ has a severe disability, but he hasn't allowed that to stop him…

Mr. NADLER. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to thank Alison Cohen for two  and a half years of outstanding service to the constituents of New  York's 12th Congressional District.

A native of Northern Virginia, Alison attended William…
